name: mlst
description: Automatic MLST calling from assembled contigs
usage:
mlst --list                                            # list known schemes
mlst [options] <contigs.{fasta,gbk,embl}[.gz]          # auto-detect scheme
mlst --scheme <scheme> <contigs.{fasta,gbk,embl}[.gz]> # force a scheme

options.description: This help
Print version and exit(default ON)
Just check dependencies and exit (default OFF)
Quiet - no stderr output (default OFF)
Number of BLAST threads (suggest GNU Parallel instead) (default '1')
Verbose debug output to stderr (default OFF)
Don't autodetect, force this scheme on all inputs (default '')
List available MLST scheme names (default OFF)
List allelles for all MLST schemes (default OFF)
Ignore these schemes (comma sep. list) (default 'ecoli,abaumannii,vcholerae_2')
Output CSV instead of TSV (default OFF)
Also write results to this file in JSON format (default '')
Replace FILE with this name instead (default '')
Strip filename paths from FILE column (default OFF)
Save novel alleles to this FASTA file (default '')
Use old legacy output with allele header row (requires --scheme) (default OFF)
DNA %identity of full allelle to consider 'similar' [~] (default '95')
DNA %cov to report partial allele at all [?] (default '10')
Minumum score out of 100 to match a scheme (when auto --scheme) (default '50')
BLAST database (default '~/.local/share/condax/envs/mlst/db/blast/mlst.fa')
PubMLST data (default '~/.local/share/condax/envs/mlst/db/pubmlst')
